# Load Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(plm)
```


# Model

## Zimbabwe

```{r}
zimbabwe <- readRDS("DHS_data/Zimbabwe/Zimbabwe_final.RDS")
```

```{r}
zim_model <- lm(abortion ~ exposed_15 + time*exposed_15 + v001 + #deaths
                foreign_aid + v501 +  v013 + v025 + v149 + v190, 
                data = zimbabwe)

tidy(zim_model)
```

```{r}
zim_model2 <- plm(abortion ~ exposed_15,
                  data = zimbabwe, 
                  index = c("v001", "caseid"),
                  model = "within")
tidy(zim_model2)
```
